Package me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets

Class MetaAsset

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.Asset
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.MetaAsset
public class MetaAsset extends Asset
Creates the pack.mcmeta and copies the pack.png for the resource pack.

  • Constructor Details

    • MetaAsset

      public MetaAsset(String name, String description, File icon)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset.
      description - The description of the resource pack.
      icon - The pack icon File. Must be a square resolution and png, 128x128 is preferred.

    • MetaAsset

      public MetaAsset(String name, String description, File icon, int packFormat)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset.
      description - The description of the resource pack.
      icon - The pack icon File. Must be a square resolution and png, 128x128 is preferred.
      packFormat - The version of the resource pack.

    • getPackFormat

      public int getPackFormat()
      Returns:
      The pack format, default for 1.18 is 8.

      Returns:
